task.title: Defining families
task.shortdesc: Collections of type "family" generate related links in HTML-based output.

step.cmd: Add the topic references to a container.
step.info: The container could be another topic reference in a hierarchy, or a <topicgroup> element, or a table cell.

step.cmd: Set the collection-type attribute of the container to "family".

taskbody.result: When you generate XHTML from the map (for example as part of an HTMLHelp or Eclipse build), the topics in the family are given related links to their siblings, sorted by information type. When you generate PDFs, these links are ignored, since the links would be repetitive and redundant in a print-oriented context.
